How to Install hwb on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • hwb

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install hwb on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing hwb on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall hwb in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install hwb, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install hwb Using apt

To install hwb in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install hwb using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install hwb

The installation of hwb might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install hwb Using apt-get

To install hwb using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install hwb.

sudo apt-get -y install hwb

Install hwb Using Synaptic

To install hwb using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install hwb on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for hwb. This will display the hwb package in the package window, now to install hwb, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the hwb package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of hwb.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install hwb Using aptitude

To install hwb on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of hwb.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install hwb using the command aptitude install hwb.

sudo aptitude -y install hwb

How to Upgrade hwb on debian

If you want to upgrade the hwb package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade hwb using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade hwb to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade hwb.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade hwb sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade hwb

Upgrade hwb using Aptitude

To upgrade hwb using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade hwb.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade hwb

Upgrade hwb using Synaptic

To upgrade hwb using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for hwb, now right-click hwb, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade hwb just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall hwb on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall hwb from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just hwb, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove hwb

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of hwb

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of hwb you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge hwb

Remove hwb using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall hwb using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for hwb, right-click the hwb package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall hwb click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install hwb on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade hwb using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.
